steps.description: Talk to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde and accept Washed Ashore
Talk to Caylais Moonfeather and get the Auberdine flight path
Talk to Innkeeper Shaussiy and set your Hearthstone to Auberdine
Travel up stairs toward Wizbang Cranktoggle
Talk to Wizbang Cranktoggle and accept Buzzbox 827
Talk to Tharnariun Treetender and accept Plagued Lands
Talk to Terenthis and accept How Big a Threat?
Talk to Gubber Blump and turn in The Family and the Fishing Pole

quests.name: The Family and the Fishing Pole

steps.description: Kill Pygmy Tide Crawlers and Young Reef Crawlers. Loot them for their Legs

tips.text: You may need to go in the water for them

steps.description: Loot the Beached Sea Creature for the Sea Creature Bones
Discover the Furbolg Camp
Use Tharnariun's Hope on a Rabid Thistle Bear

tips.text: Use Tharnariun's Hope on a Rabid Thistle Bear

steps.description: Kill Pygmy Tide Crawlers and Young Reef Crawlers. Loot them for their Legs

tips.text: You may need to go in the water for them

steps.description: Click the Buzzbox 827 on the ground and turn in Buzzbox 827
Click the Buzzbox 827 on the ground and accept Buzzbox 411
Talk to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde and turn in Washed Ashore. Accept Washed Ashore
Travel toward Cerellean Whiteclaw on the dock
Talk to Cerellean Whiteclaw and accept For Love Eternal
Travel to the end of the dock then jump into the water
Kill Darkshore Threshers. Loot them for their Eyes
Loot the Skeletal Sea Turtle for the Sea Turtle Remains
Talk to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde and turn in Washed Ashore
Talk to Barithras Moonshade and accept Cave Mushrooms
Talk to Sentinel Glynda Nal'Shea and accept The Red Crystal
Talk to Tharnariun Treetender and turn in Plagued Lands. Accept Cleansing of the Infected
Talk to Terenthis and turn in How Big a Threat?. Accept How Big a Threat? and Thundris Windweaver
Talk to Gorbold Steelhand and accept Deep Ocean, Vast Sea
Talk to Thundris Windweaver and turn in Thundris Windweaver. Accept The Cliffspring River, Tools of the Highborne, and Bashal'Aran
Kill Darkshore Threshers. Loot them for their Eyes
Swim to the wrecked Silver Dawning ship
Enter the wrecked Silver Dawning ship through the broken hull on the bottom. Loot the Silver Dawning's Lockbox on the ground

tips.text: Enter the wrecked Silver Dawning ship through the broken hull on the bottom. Make sure you have a full breath bar before diving down and entering

steps.description: Swim to the wrecked Mist Veil ship
Enter the wrecked Mist Veil ship through the broken hull on the bottom. Loot the Mist Veil's Lockbox on the ground

tips.text: Enter the wrecked Mist Veil ship through the broken hull on the bottom. Make sure you have a full breath bar before diving down and entering

steps.description: Kill Darkshore Threshers. Loot them for their Eyes
Click the Buzzbox 411 on the ground and turn in Buzzbox 411. Accept Buzzbox 323
Click the Beached Sea Creature and accept Beached Sea Creature
Collect 5 Earthroot as you quest
Kill Foreststriders and Foreststrider Fledglings. Loot them for their Strider Meat
Kill Moonstalkers and Moonstalker Runts. Loot them for their Fangs
Kill Rabid Thistle Bears
Click the Beached Sea Turtle and accept Beached Sea Turtle
Use the Empty Sampling Tube at the base of the Cliffspring River

tips.text: Use the Empty Sampling Tube at the base of the Cliffspring River

steps.description: Travel to Bashal'Aran
Talk to Asterion and turn in Bashal'Aran. Accept Bashal'Aran

tips.text: Avoid killing Wild Grells and Vile Sprites en-route

steps.description: Kill Wild Grells and Vile Sprites. Loot them for their Earrings
Talk to Asterion and turn in Bashal'Aran. Accept Bashal'Aran
Kill Deth'ryll Satyr. Loot them for the Moonstone Seal
Talk to Asterion and turn in Bashal'Aran. Accept Bashal'Aran
Kill Moonkin. Loot them for their Small Eggs. Travel to The Red Crystal

tips.text: You will level Cooking to 10 later using Small Eggs

steps.description: Travel to The Red Crystal
Kill Moonkin. Loot them for their Small Eggs
Travel south toward Sentinel Tysha Moonblade at Ameth'Aran
Talk to Sentinel Tysha Moonblade and accept The Fall of Ameth'Aran
Kill Anaya Dawnrunner. Loot her for her Pendant

tips.text: Anaya Dawnrunner patrols Ameth'Aran

steps.description: Kill Cursed Highbornes, Writhing Highbornes and Wailing Highbornes. Loot them for their Relics
Click the The Fall of Ameth'Aran
Click the Ancient Flame
Click the The Lay of Ameth'Aran
Kill Anaya Dawnrunner. Loot her for her Pendant

tips.text: Anaya Dawnrunner patrols Ameth'Aran

steps.description: Kill Cursed Highbornes, Writhing Highbornes and Wailing Highbornes. Loot them for their Relics
Kill Anaya Dawnrunner. Loot her for her Pendant

tips.text: Anaya Dawnrunner patrols Ameth'Aran. She has a long respawn timer and if she isn't up right now, you may skip this step

steps.description: Talk to Sentinel Tysha Moonblade and turn in The Fall of Ameth'Aran
Kill Moonstalkers and Moonstalker Runts. Loot them for their Fangs
Kill Foreststriders and Foreststrider Fledglings. Loot them for their Strider Meat
Kill Rabid Thistle Bears
Kill Blackwood Pathfinders and Blackwood Windtalkers
Grind to level 16
Click the Beached Sea Turtle and accept Beached Sea Turtle
Click the Beached Sea Creature and accept Beached Sea Creature
Kill Rabid Thistle Bears
Kill Foreststriders and Foreststrider Fledglings. Loot them for their Strider Meat
Travel to Auberdine
Talk to Gubber Blump and accept Fruit of the Sea
Talk to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde and turn in Beached Sea Creature, Beached Sea Creature, Beached Sea Turtle, and Beached Sea Turtle
Travel toward Cerellean Whiteclaw on the dock
Talk to Cerellean Whiteclaw and turn in For Love Eternal
Take the boat to Darnassus
Take the purple portal into Darnassus
Talk to Jocaste and train your class spells
Talk to Jandria and train your class spells
Talk to Darnath Bladesinger and train your class spells
Talk to Syurna inside the tree house and train your class spells
Talk to Ilyenia Moonfire and train Bows and Staves
Take the purple portal back to Rut'theran
Talk to Vesprystus and fly to Darkshore
Talk to Gorbold Steelhand and buy Mild Spices. Use the Mild Spices and your Small Eggs to make Herb Baked Eggs. Do this until your Cooking has reached level 10

tips.text: Use the Mild Spices and your Small Eggs to make Herb Baked Eggs. Do this until your Cooking has reached level 10

steps.description: Use your Cooking profession to make Herb Baked Eggs. Do this until your Cooking has reached level 10

tips.text: Use your Cooking profession to make Herb Baked Eggs. Do this until your Cooking has reached level 10

steps.description: Talk to Gorbold Steelhand and turn in Deep Ocean, Vast Sea
Talk to Alanndarian Nightsong and accept Easy Strider Living. Turn in Easy Strider Living
Talk to Thundris Windweaver and turn in Tools of the Highborne and The Cliffspring River. Accept The Blackwood Corrupted
Talk to Sentinel Glynda Nal'Shea and turn in The Red Crystal. Accept As Water Cascades
Use the Empty Water Tube at the Auberdine Moonwell

tips.text: Use the Empty Water Tube at the Auberdine Moonwell

steps.description: Use the Empty Cleansing Bowl at the Auberdine Moonwell

tips.text: Use the Empty Cleansing Bowl at the Auberdine Moonwell

steps.description: Talk to Tharnariun Treetender and turn in Cleansing of the Infected. Accept Tharnariun's Hope
Talk to Terenthis and turn in How Big a Threat?
Talk to Terenthis and accept A Lost Master
Talk to Sentinel Elissa Starbreeze up stairs and accept The Tower of Althalaxx
Kill Moonstalkers and Moonstalker Runts. Loot them for their Fangs
Travel to The Red Crystal again
Click the The Red Crystal and turn in As Water Cascades. Accept The Fragments Within
Travel toward Asterion at Bashal'Aran
Talk to Asterion and turn in Bashal'Aran
Kill Blackwood Warriors and Blackwood Totemics. Loot them for their Linen Cloth

tips.text: You need to save 10 Linen Cloth for your Paladin class quest later

steps.description: Open the Blackwood Grain Stores. Loot it for the Blackwood Grain Sample

tips.text: Looting this will spawn 2 Blackwood Furbolgs that will agro and run at you. Be ready to fight them or reset them

steps.description: Kill Den Mother

tips.text: Be aware of the Thistle Cubs which can stun you for 2 seconds

steps.description: Open the Blackwood Nut Stores. Loot it for the Blackwood Nut Sample

tips.text: Looting this will spawn 2 Blackwood Furbolgs that will agro and run at you. Be ready to fight them or reset them

steps.description: Open the Blackwood Fruit Stores. Loot it for the Blackwood Fruit Sample

tips.text: Looting this will spawn 2 Blackwood Furbolgs that will agro and run at you. Be ready to fight them or reset them

steps.description: Use the Filled Cleansing Bowl at the Bonfire to summon Xabraxxis

tips.text: Use the Filled Cleansing Bowl at the Bonfire to summon Xabraxxis

steps.description: Kill Xabraxxis. Open the Xabraxxis' Demon Bag he drops on the ground. Loot it for the Talisman of Corruption
Travel to the Cliffspring River Cave
Use the Empty Cliffspring Falls Sampler in the water at the entrance of the Cliffspring River Cave

tips.text: Use the Empty Cliffspring Falls Sampler in the water at the entrance of the Cliffspring River Cave

steps.description: Loot the Scaber Stalks and Death Cap on the ground

tips.text: Stay on the upper section. If the Death Cap is not at the end of the top side, drop down and get one from below
Don't face your back to the center! Stormscale Wave Rider's can knock you back!

steps.description: Exit the Cliffspring River Cave
Kill Moonstalkers and Moonstalker Runts. Loot them for their Fangs
Talk to Balthule Shadowstrike and turn in The Tower of Althalaxx. Accept The Tower of Althalaxx
Kill Dark Strand Fanatics. Loot them for their Parchments
Kill Dark Strand Fanatics. Loot them for their Parchments and Linen Cloth

tips.text: You need to save 10 Linen Cloth for your Paladin class quest later

steps.description: Talk to Balthule Shadowstrike and turn in The Tower of Althalaxx. Accept The Tower of Althalaxx
Travel to Mist's Edge
Talk to Gelkak Gyromast and accept Gyromast's Retrieval
Kill Raging Reef Crawlers and Encrusted Tide Crawlers. Loot them for the Bottom of Gelkak's Key

tips.text: Be aware of Raging Reef Crawlers Thrash ability. You can take 200 damage instantly from their melee hits

steps.description: Kill Greymist Oracles and Greymist Tidehunter. Loot them for the Middle of Gelkak's Key

tips.text: Be aware of Greymist Oracles Lightning Bolt damage and they can also heal with Healing Wave

steps.description: Kill Raging Reef Crawlers and Encrusted Tide Crawlers. Loot them for the Bottom of Gelkak's Key

tips.text: Be aware of Raging Reef Crawlers Thrash ability. You can take 200 damage instantly from their melee hits

steps.description: Kill Giant Foreststriders. Loot them for the Top of Gelkak's Key
Kill Moonstalker Sires and Moonstalker Matriarchs. Loot them for their Pelts and Fangs

tips.text: Be aware of Moonstalker Matriarchs. They always attack with a Moonstalker Runt by their side

steps.description: Talk to Gelkak Gyromast and turn in Gyromast's Retrieval. Accept Gyromast's Revenge
Talk to The Threshwackonator 4100 to start the escort. Escort The Threshwackonator 4100 to Gelkak Gyromast. Kill The Threshwackonator 4100 once it turns hostile

tips.text: This quest is VERY difficult
Click here for a video guide

steps.description: Talk to Gelkak Gyromast and turn in Gyromast's Revenge
Delete Gyromast's Key from your inventory
Click the Beached Sea Turtle and accept Beached Sea Turtle
Swim out in the water. Open the Strange Lockbox. Loot it for the Half Pendant of Aquatic Agility

tips.text: Swim out in the water

steps.description: Kill Encrusted Tide Crawlers and Reef Crawlers. Loot them for their Crab Chunks

tips.text: If the Encrusted Tide Crawlers are too strong, focus on just Reef Crawlers

steps.description: Click the Buzzbox 323 on the ground and turn in Buzzbox 323. Accept Buzzbox 525
Kill Encrusted Tide Crawlers and Reef Crawlers. Loot them for their Crab Chunks

tips.text: If the Encrusted Tide Crawlers are too strong, focus on just Reef Crawlers

steps.description: Grind until you are 2750 xp away from level 18. Kill Blackwood Warriors and Blackwood Totemics
Hearth to Auberdine
Talk to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde and turn in Beached Sea Turtle
Talk to Gubber Blump and turn in Fruit of the Sea
Talk to Barithras Moonshade and turn in Cave Mushrooms. Accept Onu
Talk to Sentinel Glynda Nal'Shea and turn in The Fragments Within
Talk to Tharnariun Treetender and turn in Tharnariun's Hope
Talk to Terenthis and turn in A Lost Master. Accept A Lost Master
Talk to Alanndarian Nightsong and accept Easy Strider Living. Turn in Easy Strider Living
Talk to Thundris Windweaver and turn in The Blackwood Corrupted
Talk to Alanndarian Nightsong and turn in The Principal Source. Accept Gathering the Cure
Kill Moonkin. Loot them for their Small Eggs. Loot Lunar Fungi on the ground throughout caves
Kill Moonkin. Loot them for their Small Eggs
Finish off collecting 5 Earthroot. You can gather them along the mountains east
Talk to Alanndarian Nightsong and turn in Gathering the Cure. Accept Curing the Sick
Head south while using the Curative Animal Salve on Sickly Deer

tips.text: Head south while using the Curative Animal Salve on Sickly Deer

steps.description: Cast Teleport: Moonglade
Go to Moonglade. Talk to Dendrite Starblaze and turn in Curing the Sick. Accept Power over Poison
Talk to Loganaar and train your class spells
Talk to Silva Fil'naveth and fly to Rut'theran Village
Take the purple portal into Darnassus
Talk to Mathrengyl Bearwalker up stairs and turn in Power over Poison
Take the purple portal back to Rut'theran
Talk to Vesprystus and fly to Darkshore
Travel to the Auberdine Docks. Wait for the Menethil Harbor boat
Level your First Aid and Cooking while waiting for the Menethil Harbor boat. Take the boat to Menethil Harbor

tips.text: Level your First Aid and Cooking while waiting for the Menethil Harbor boat
